de.jcommandlineparser
Class CmdLineParserImpl

java.lang.Object
  de.jcommandlineparser.CmdLineParserImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CmdLineParser
public class CmdLineParserImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmdLineParser

Highly flexible command line option parser.
Parsing logic is dedicated to parsing strategies, which makes this parser highly flexible and adaptive. If given parsing strategies do not fit your needs, it is easily possible to implement and use your own strategy.

Author:
bananenkasper
See Also:
Strategy

addStrategy

public <S extends Strategy> void addStrategy(S s)
Description copied from interface: CmdLineParser
Add a (custom) Strategy for parsing. Most common parsing strategies are included by default, such as parsing strategies for expressions like this:
--key=value
--key value1 [value2] [value3] [..]
-v1[v2][v3][..]
Therefore, in most cases, there will be no need to add a further strategy.

Specified by:
addStrategy in interface CmdLineParser
Type Parameters:
S - Implementation type of Strategy
Parameters:
s - Strategy for parsing.
See Also:
Strategy
